author: elecharny
msg: Fixed Derby initialization. It would have failed when embedding more than one LDAP server

author: reinhard
msg: patch file adding transformers to the cocoon-stax component full filling the most common tasks (add, remove, delete). Further more a StAXCleaningTransformer has been added. For all transformers tests are provided.
I applied the patch with some minor modifications of the formatting (please use 2 spaces indentation in XML files)
